name: A Cool Breeze
description:
There are a lot of details and parts of the game that are somewhat hidden, and are only found interacting with things more than once...

Choosing different things affect other things, and open up new parts to the game that might have been missed. 

Keep your eyes open. (Plus, tell me if you find any issues.)

Some words

This is my first game with Bitsy. I spent about five days making it. 

I really like Bitsy, because it's very easy to make simple games, and most of the making is just creating a story.

I'm thinking of making more games with Bitsy, because this game is only scratching the surface. 

There are more hacks for Bitsy I haven't tried, and more possibilites!

Disclaimer

Not all breezes contained within the program are guaranteed to be cool. 

4/7 breezes tested for thermal energy reported an either low or above average amount of particle movement. 

At the time, refunds on encountered breezes and gusts of wind within the program are not available. 

I hope you enjoy it!

Tell me what you think!
